alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 9:59AM CST until February 25 at 10:31AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. Luxapallila Creek Near Columbus affecting Lowndes County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...From this morning to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 25.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this morning and crest at 27.4 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Noxubee River Macon 26.0 25.9 Wed 9 am CST 26.6 23.9 21.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 7 PM CST.
